title: ‘Clinton Operative’ Removed Secret Folder from Her Lectern After Debate?
subtitle: Both Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump had papers on their lecterns that were likely just notes they took during the debate, not incriminating evidence removed by a hired 'cleaner.'
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: An operative for Hillary Clinton "swooped in" and took answers to debate questions off her lectern after the conclusion of the event.
